content.label: Alot if the time, the game doesnt register the symbols drawn even thought they are drawn correctly. Especially the backwards 3 symbol. It has to be exact or else it doesnt register almost every time

The only problem I have, is that sometimes I will draw the shape, the pattern will turn it's color, and then it will not do anything. I have lost so many rounds because of it (and yes I am drawing the shape correctly). Otherwise this is an amazing game!! I am addicted!!

It is a good game, though it becomes really frustrating when you draw the symbol shown, and it doesn't accept it. For example, the two loops on one of the Knights don't usually work. If anyone is downloading this game, keep in mind, it is fun, fantastic, and VERY frustrating.
This game is super fun and addicting I highly recommend you try it. But I found a MAJOR bug. When selecting a game mode the left and right arrow buttons don't work at all!
Fast, fun, challenging! Your fingers won't stop drawing the most weird-looking symbols. Refreshing!
Can't get past my high score of 69. 10/10 would pop balloons with spells while dressed like Harry Potter again.

GAME IS SUPER FUN AND ADDICTING DON't GET ME WRONG, but there are just a few things that annoy the heck out of me. First, the ads. I don't mind them too much, but for some reason, whenever I try to click the X on the top right hand corner of it, THE BUTTON DOESN'T WORK!!!!!!! Fix that because it's really annoying for the fact that I experience this every time am pancake pops up (basically every other round). Also, on insane mode, the magic backwards 3 is way to hard to get. U guys made it way too strict to where when I get a good backwards 3 75% of the time it still doesn't work!! Plz fix this but other than that I love the game :)
I love the game but it's kinda annoying when I play on insane mode and the three symbol never goes through.
I love the game and if not for this I would have gave it 5/5. But, the game doesn't always recognize the drawings/writing, when I am writing it pretty close.
I love this game and all but there are so many glitches and the game just starts freezing
its fun and all but it doesnt recognize my drawings and its too annoying

Awesome game, I find one thing annoying though. On insane the E symbol doesn't seem to register all the time. Kinda annoying because it basically makes that mode unplayable, but that's a minor inconvenience in an otherwise flawless game.
There are many bugs that need to be sorted out, especially with the cursive L shape in particular. It a lot of times doesn't register when I write it almost perfectly.

This game is great and everything but there are two major flaws. First of all, the game has a bunch of ads. How am I suppose to play if there are ads in face after every single round! Also, if you are going to put ads after rounds, can you put them after maybe 5 or 8 rounds. I know you will get less money from ad revenue but it is really annoying. Second of all, what do you want me to draw? I am not an artist and most people aren't especially under pressure. I mean a lot of the times I am drawing something like that "E" looking thing, it doesn't register it. I hope you fix those problems

title.label: I love this game, but why can't I use my own music?

content.label:
The game, so cute and fun! I play it whenever I want to de-stress for a few.  

The only problem is, I like having my own music or podcast in the background, and that seems to be a problem... Is there a possible fix for this?

Thanks guys, keep up the good work!
EPIC game pls get it

title.label: Its great but one fatal flaw

content.label: I love this game and just got a high score of 281 but i could've gone longer but the game didn't pause after a low battery notification popped up and im pretty ticked off about it so maybe add it so that the game pauses when something like that happens.
Does extreme mode stand for extreme lag? I can't get past 12 because of this, it's kinda ridiculous considering I can get over 60 easy on normal and over 100 in zen but not 12 in extreme? Please fix

title.label: Good Game... Needs to be Fixed

content.label: Please fix bugs with recognizing strokes. They seem to be newly introduced. Will download again when you do.

The fact that this relies on ads and the controls being WAY to demanding of the user, makes me cringe when I lose a game because I didn't draw an O right, and then see an ad for toichi panda or game of war for the 30th time.

title.label: Bought remove ads but still sees ads

content.label: This game kinda hurts my eye but its a Good game. Ads are still there

I really like this game! I've inly just started playing it, but it seems there's a lot to unlock, and the gameplay keeps me on the edge of my seat. Even just the main menu has good sfx and is put together really nicely. Great game for fun, highly recommend!

I have been playing this game for a while now and had a number of characters unlocked. Then with the most recent update I unlocked the Fairy character and her animation and color set over wrote every other character. I'd rather not have a Druid character that shoots hearts at people. Once this is fixed the game will be worthy of five stars.

title.label: Agreed To Wizard Abilities And I'm Not The Owner Of The Game

content.label: I Like Your Wizard Abilities Idea And I Hope You See This And I Like Minecraft

You guys should give each wizard their own power ups or abilities.  This way gameplay is not only enrichened but, this would give us more incentive to buy them versus for cosmetic reasons only. Love this game and all of the updates so far! Keep up the good work.

I love this game and I'm glad for all the new features that have been added, but I am rather upset that I can no longer draw more than one line at once. I am not sure whether or not this was intentional but either way I think it was a mistake. Being able to draw multiple shapes was very useful for me and made the game more fun. What's more there's an achievement for using both hands that no one can get anymore.
The game is very fun and addictiveüòÄ
Love, love this game, but I've noticed the game has a much harder time recognizing gestures drawn with the left hand!
Whenever I play Time Attack it always crashes.

title.label: Add a reward for Time Attack!

content.label: Love the game, but it needs a reward for Time Attack mode.

title.label: POPPIN FO DAYZ!!!!! I ALSO HAVE SOME POINTERS

content.label: BEST NITROME APP I HAVE SEEN, AND THATS SAYING A LOT. The game is amazing and I have some good ideas that could make it better, in "PLATFORM PANIC" the avatars had upgrades and I think you should do the same for all of the wizards. Also it needs something like a pet system were you pay coins to get an egg or earn one by popping an egg balloon, the egg would contain a pet of a random rarity each with its own attack that would aid in your EPIC QUEST!!!

Like it says in the title it's the best game ever since flappy bird. It is so addicting and fun. Has the potential of being in the number one spot in the top charts. I am going to get as many people to play it and rate it so it can be heard.
I can't even play it because it has a google play thingy popped right in my phone I can't even play my game so I deleted it):(
Muito bom e desafiador
They should make the Zen mode

Super fun game, probably one of the best i've played in a while, but there are a few annoying things. 1) The incessant bell dinging when you lose and go into the shop needs to stop. 2) I shouldn't have to try to avoid combos so that the "Combo x2" popup doesn't cover the next balloon i'm trying to pop. 3) The shape recognition seems spot on for everything except the "U" shape (but maybe i'm just bad at it).

Super fun game, probably one of the best i've played in a while, but there are a few annoying things. 1) The incessant bell dinging when you lose and go into the shop needs to stop. 2) I shouldn't have to try to avoid combos so that the "Combo x2" popup doesn't cover the next balloon i'm trying to pop. 3) The shape recognition seems spot on for everything except the "U" shape (but maybe i'm just bad at it).
Fun
I'm just confused what to say about this awesome game. I didn't used to work with my iPhone much, but now I can't put it down. Thanks Nitrome.
This game is seriously addicting. Simple draw interaction and it's challenging. I could play this for hours. Love the music too.

This is an amazingly fun game and the new update is even better with the new time attack mode! My first time playing the game was a little hard but after awhile I got the hang of it and u will too (trust meüòâ). My little brother loves this game and he's only 6. This game challenges me in a fun way and it gives me an excuse to practice on my reflexives. I have no problems out of it and is by far the only game I have that doesn't have adds popping up out of nowhere! So I loveüòçüòç this game and I suggest everyone to get it!!!
(All the time, especially while playing the time attack)

title.label: I am crazy about this game

content.label:
This is the kind of game I love to see in the App Store: a very cute, very polished, fast-paced pixelated drop-down-style game with cute characters,
attractive backgrounds, and helpful perks. This game is a gem!
I really really like what you did with the update!!! I think if you continue on the track you are going you can make something truly great!!!

This app is very fun and addictive coming from a person who rarely plays games! I like how you get to draw the symbols and how hard it gets making me want to play it more! Overall ,very well createdüòã
This game is really fun and good to waste time. It's a high score type game that is really creative a frustrating.

This app is totally fun and kinda addicting. One of my favorite apps ever. Congratulations to the developers and please, continue like this. 
PD: love all your games nitrome <3

Thx guys you made a great game and it's a good time waster so if the poeple want to wast there time this is the game. It's really challenging to me because it progresses really fast and the enemy's or "Knights" as you call them start going faster. The new update is fantastic thank you guys for the great game to play when I'm bored
Your great. That's what the message said on the new update. I'm currently deleting this app because they didn't take the time to proofread their messages. That's all.
